Abstract: Technical Education- Government Engineering College Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad- Additional charge of Administrative Assistant to Shri. Ragesh R, Senior Superintendent- proceedings- Ratified- Orders issued.
Order Issued By: (By order of the Governor) SREEKALA  DEPUTY SECRETARY
Body Para: In the circumstances reported by the Director of Technical Education as pe the letter read above, Government are pleased to ratify the action of the Director of Technical Education, Thiruvananthapuram in according ful additional charge of Administrative Assistant, Government Engineerin College Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad to Shri. Ragesh R, Senior Superintendent Government Engineering College, Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad for the perio trom 01.06.2020 to 02.07.2020, under Rule 53(b) Part 1 KSR.
